data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Yang, Lin, Chen, Xiang-Sheng (2012): Review of bamboo-feeding leafhopper genus Bambusananus Li & Xing (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae: Deltocephalinae) with description of a new species from China. Zootaxa 3353: 48-54, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.210997
